title.narrative: Seismic Resilience and Energy Efficiency in Public Buildings Project

description.narrative: The proposed Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve the disaster resilience and reduce energy use in selected Central Government Buildings, and to strengthen the policy framework and institutional capacity to develop, finance and implement resilient and sustainable public buildings in Turkey.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.2(b). The Borrower, through MoEU, shall, by no later than 30 days after the Effective Date, hireand/or assign to the PIU one (1) procurement specialist, one (1) financial management specialist, one (1) environmental specialist,one (1) social specialist, and one (1) occupational health and safety specialist, all with terms of reference and qualificationsacceptable to the Bank.
LA, Schedule 2, Section I.B. The Borrower, through MoEU, shall maintain throughout Project implementation, a Project OperationsManual (“POM”), in substance and manner acceptable to the Bank.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.C. For the purposes of carrying out Part 1 of the Project, the Borrower, through MoEU, shall ensure that,unless otherwise agreed to by the Bank in writing and thereafter incorporated into the POM, each Subproject is appraised, selectedand prioritized in accordance with standards, criteria and procedures acceptable to the Bank, as specified in the Loan Agreementandfurther detailed in the POM.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.D.1 and 2. The Borrower, through MoEU, shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance withthe Environmental and Social Standards, and with the Environmental and Social Commitment Plan, in a manner acceptable to the Bank.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.E.1 and 2. The Borrower, through MoEU, shall prepare and furnish to the Bank not later than June 30th ofeach year during the implementation of the Project, a proposed Annual Work Plan and Budget, afford the Bank a reasonableopportunity to exchange views on each such proposed Annual Work Plan and Budget, and shall thereafter ensure that the Project isimplemented with due diligence during said following year, in accordance with such Annual Work Plan and Budget as shall have beenapproved by the Bank.

Loan Agreement (LA), Schedule 2, Section I.A(b). The Borrower, through MoEU, shall maintain, throughout Project implementation, aProject Implementation Unit (“PIU”) under the General Directorate of Construction Affairs, with functions and responsibilitiesacceptable to the Bank, for the implementation of the Project.
